projects.title: Database Management Software
projects.description:
I have worked 6 months on a database management software for a company from Romania.
    Provided all the code and hired another staff member 5 months in only for the maintenance of the software.
    The client is happy and the product has been delivered as per contract, the software itself has been developed in NodeJS using the Electron framework (as requested by the company).

projects.title: Application Development
projects.description:
My deep dive into the "apps" world has helped me learn a lot about game design and creating applications for mobile devices.
    I have been using Unity since 2016, but ever since they have showed a disregard towards their customers I have opted for an FOSS ( Free Open Source ) Game Engine, Godot Game Engine.

    After only a week I have mastered Godot Engine's basics and have become confident enough at creating my own app ( Neon Bounce ).
